Name: Stomping Tantrum
Effect: Single Target. Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Move if the User failed the Accuracy Roll of the last Move it performed. If the Target is Out of Range due to using the Move 'Dig', this Move hits anyways.
Description: The Pok√©mon throws a tantrum and stomps all over the place, it becomes worse if something has previously frustrated them.
